Interface DeserializationContext

All Superinterfaces:
DeserializationSupport
public interface DeserializationContext
extends DeserializationSupport

Context used for deserialization.

registerInstance

void registerInstance(Identifier identifier,
                      java.lang.Object instance)
Allows to register a new instance inside the map of the deserialized objects.

Parameters:
identifier - identifier of the instance.
instance - instance object.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the identifier already has an instance.

getDeserializerFor

Deserializer getDeserializerFor(java.lang.Class clazz,
                                java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations)
                                throws DeserializationException
Returns the deserializer for the given class.

Parameters:
clazz - class for which is needed a deserializer.
annotations - annotations associated to clazz.
Returns:
deserializer associated to the class.
Throws:
DeserializationException
